General.Name: Sung Bo Chem
General.Description: Sung Bo Chemicals Co., LTD provides crop protection products for the agricultural industry in South Korea. The company manufactures and sells crop protection agents through crop protection agent vendors, etc.; and rents factories, a building, and parking lots. It is also involved in the research, cultivation, and distribution of smart farm-based crops; and development, production, and sale of functional materials. The company was formerly known as Seoul Agricultural Chemicals Co Ltd. and changed its name to Sung Bo Chemicals Co., LTD in January 1990. Sung Bo Chemicals Co., LTD was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.
